abi: event OfferCreated(uint256 indexed offerId, address indexed seller, string title)
event OfferPurchased(uint256 indexed offerId, address indexed buyer, address indexed seller)
function createOffer(string _title, string _description, bytes32 _encryptedPrice, bytes32 _encryptedDuration, bytes32 _encryptedSlots, bytes _attestation)
function getContractStats() view returns (uint256 _totalOffers, uint256 _totalPurchases, uint256 _totalVolume, uint256 _activeOffers)

function getEncryptedOffer(uint256 _offerId) view returns (address seller, string title, string description, bytes32 encryptedPrice, bytes32 encryptedDuration, bytes32 encryptedSlots, bytes32 encryptedIsActive, uint256 createdAt)
function getOffer(uint256 _offerId) view returns (address seller, string title, string description, uint256 createdAt)
function getUserPurchases(address _user) view returns ((address buyer, uint256 offerId, uint256 purchaseTime, bool isRedeemed, bytes32 encryptedIsRedeemed)[])

function offers(uint256) view returns (address seller, string title, string description, bytes32 encryptedPrice, bytes32 encryptedDuration, bytes32 encryptedSlots, bytes32 encryptedIsActive, uint256 createdAt)
function userPurchases(address, uint256) view returns (address buyer, uint256 offerId, uint256 purchaseTime, bool isRedeemed, bytes32 encryptedIsRedeemed)

fhevm.note: Full FHEVM implementation with SepoliaConfig inheritance
